sentences.en: A pensioner has died after he was stung by a bee during a picnic.
sentences.cn: 一位老人在野餐时被野蜂叮了后就去世了.

sentences.en: At 65, he may be pensioner, have a weak heart and have suffered from prostate cancer.
sentences.cn: 他65岁, 本应该是一位领取养老金的老人, 心脏衰弱,患有前列腺癌.

sentences.en: He is already an old man and pensioner, but quite active.
sentences.cn: 他已经是个老年人,领养老金了, 但是精力相当充沛.

sentences.en: Old age pensioner is admitted at half price.
sentences.cn: 领取养老金老人可享受半价.
领取养老金[退休金]的老人

sentences.en: So by working , I, though a pensioner myself, continue to help to support other old people.
sentences.cn: 因此,通过工作, 虽然我已经是个领退休金的人, 但继续帮助供养其他老年人.

sentences.en: South Korea is currently well placed , with six citizens of working age for every pensioner.
sentences.cn: 韩国现状良好, 适龄劳动人口与养老金领取者的比例为六比一.

sentences.en: The delighted pensioner walked off with a £2,000 prize.
sentences.cn: 那个退休老人轻松赢得了2,000英镑的奖金，高兴得不得了。

sentences.en: The tax threshold a pensioner is $ 6 , 000.
sentences.cn: 领退休金的人的“纳税”起点是六千美元.

sentences.en: The tax threshold for a pensioner is $ 6,000.
sentences.cn: 领退休金的人的纳税起点是六千美元.

sentences.en: They might also provide money to family members when the pensioner dies.
sentences.cn: 参加养老金的人去世后,也可能给其家人提供资金.

words.tran_cn: 有资格领退休金的；可领退休金的
退休金，抚恤金；津贴；膳宿费
（意）家庭式旅馆；膳宿公寓；寄宿学校

trans.tran_cn: 领取退休、养老金或抚恤金的人，退休的人，随从，跟班，<英>剑桥大学的自费生
